citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:15 pm on
02/22/2016.
The inspector spoke with an individual who indicated the representative was not at facility and could not return
within a half hour.
